body.p: The undersigned petitioners citizans of Estill county would represent to Your excellency that at the June term 1865 of the Estill circuit court that Adam Tyra was fined ten dollars as surveyor of the road -- besides costs that Tyra was had at the time of the Judgment removed to the state of Illinois, & was not present when the Judgment was renderd -- that Tyra had worked said road & put the same in good order before he left & thought that by removing that he was released but in his absence Judgment was taken against him
Tyra is a poor man & we believe the Judgment should be remitted -- Decr 1865

E Hernden
Robt Riddell Jr.
Jefferson Willing
Daniel Flenchem
C W Friend
Samuel C. Blythe
James R Neal
James M Mauppin
Samuel Hines
